name: Angry Eels
description: Experience Snake like never before with Angry Eels! Developed in Unity by Griffin Atkinson, this modern take on the classic game features advanced gameplay mechanics and customizable rules, along with competitive multiplayer akin to Tron. With an advanced input and movement system, high score tracking, and visually stunning graphics and sounds, Angry Eels offers an exhilarating and immersive experience for players of all skill levels. Prepare to be hooked with Angry Eels, the ultimate Snake experience!
